jd: Hi, I am Kaviarasan from Exaways Corporation! Exaways Corporation. Excellent communication skills in all areas including procedural documentation, incident reporting and information relaying. Team player with the ability to maintain a pleasant personality and a professional demeanor in stressful situations.
